body: At 5th level, the demagogue gains the ability to quickly gather a crowd. This is identical to the gather crowd ability of the celebrity bard archetype. This ability replaces lore master.
name: Gather Crowd
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Demagogue/Bardic Performance/Gather Crowd
